pr_title: [CDAP-17084] Limit request log entries to be <= 200 (RequestHistoryTab)

timeline.bodyText: Could you do requestLog.values().forEach((v) => { count += v.size; });? This would save a conversion and a lookup.
timeline.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText: Because I've updated the code from previous related PRs, we no longer need to look up values
replies.author: jennac3
